definition: (of speech) painful or bitter, the taste experience when common salt is taken into the mouth, preserve with salt
details:
adjective
- (of speech) painful or bitter
= example: (of speech) painful or bitter
noun
- the taste experience when common salt is taken into the mouth
= synonyms: saltiness, salinity
- white crystalline form of especially sodium chloride used to season and preserve food
= synonyms: table salt
- a compound formed by replacing hydrogen in an acid by a metal (or a radical that acts like a metal)
verb
- preserve with salt
= example: preserve with salt
= synonyms: corn
- add zest or liveliness to
= example: add zest or liveliness to
- sprinkle as if with salt
= example: sprinkle as if with salt
- add salt to
= synonyms: salinate
